overview.modelconnect.title: Model Connect
sidebar.modelconnect.title: Model Connect
documentation.modelconnect.description: Provides functionalities for installing and managing models on a ctrlX OS
ctrlX OS License - Model Connect Basic
Target runtime for MATLAB/Simulink® code or FMU with max. 3 inputs, no synchronous mode.
ctrlX OS License - Model Connect Performance
Target runtime for MATLAB/Simulink® code or FMU with unlimited inputs and synchronous mode.
ctrlX OS License - Model Connect Advanced (add-on)
Target runtime for MATLAB/Simulink® code or FMU with unlimited inputs and synchronous mode - add-on for Model Connect Basic license
scopes-declaration.modelconnect.web.name: Model Connect
View images showing model structure. If not selected, the user is shown a default image instead
scopes-declaration.modelconnect.models.r: View installed models/functions and their execution status
Besides viewing models/functions, the user can change their execution status and write to inputs and block/model parameters
Besides operating models/functions, the user can upload and remove models/functions
